column3: The AHCCC is warm and welcoming and offered our family a great place to work out ! The gym is comprehensive and there are a wide variety of classes.

column2: A fantastic facility with fitness center , workout classes, badminton , volleyball , rock wall, Pickleball , rental room
column3: If you are looking to work out at a beautiful, reasonably-priced Center, the Agoura Hills/Calabasas Community Center is the place! Located in Calabasas behind the Lost Hills Sheriff Station, there are so many offerings: fitness classes including Muscle Conditioning, Zumba, Yoga, Spin, Ballet, RIPPED , a fully equipped fitness center, programs including rock wall, fencing , badminton, basketball, volleyball , Pickleball ... column2: Live here if you can afford it
column3: If my gross monthly income is about 50K a month, I could probably live here. It's very quiet. Friendly neighborhood. Close to the beach. lots of eateries. close to the freeways. Shopping center within 10 miles...what else could you want except enough money to pay your mortgage?
